select b.business_no business_no , b.business_name business_name , u.id id ,u.name name
,(select count(*) from logic l where l.business_no = b.business_no and l.category="problem") problem_sum
,(select count(*) from logic l where l.business_no = b.business_no and l.category="answer") anwser_sum
from projectdb.business b, projectdb.user_info u
where 1 = 1 and b.user_id=u.user_id
order by b.business_no

select b.business_no business_no , b.business_name business_name , u.id id ,u.name name
,(select count(*) from logic l where l.business_no = b.business_no and l.category="problem") problem_sum
,(select count(*) from logic l where l.business_no = b.business_no and l.category="answer") anwser_sum
from projectdb.business b, projectdb.user_info u
where 1 = 1 and b.user_id=u.user_id and b.business_name like CONCAT('%',#{business_name},'%')
order by business_no
